overview:
Andrew Textor heads up business development for the GotGame Network, the fastest growing social portal for gamers aged 18-34.

Andrew attended Lehigh University and graduated in 2005 with a degree in History and international relations.

Andrew worked at GameSpot.com as an advertising account manager for over 2 years and represented the Games & Entertainment business unit in the 2008 CNET National Sales Conference.

GotGame recently launched Rogue, the first fully enabled in game web browser that allows users to watch video, check e-mails, look for help and surf the web without leaving their game. You’ve GotGame and We’ve got you covered.
